name: Western Mountaineering Bristlecone MF -23C Winter Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Bristlecone MF -23C Winter Down Sleeping Bag
description: No cold can turn you away when you're hunkered down in your Bristlecone. It's built big and is filled with down, to yield 20cm of simmering loft to keeps you heated.  A large draft tube and down filled collar make certain that winter remains outside. With 2 zippers, it can be zipped to other Western Mountaineering mummy bags or unzipped to lie flat.Shell is weather-resistant MicroLite XP™ microfibre. While extremely weather resistant, MicroLite XP retains excellent breathability to prevent your bag from wetting out.Semi-rectangular shape with a full collar and insulated hood.Insulated with goose down.15cm spacing, sideblock baffle construction.2 #5 YKK locking zippers.
